      • notifyUseCaseStart

        protected abstract void notifyUseCaseStart(T listener)
        Notifies the listener that the use case has started.
        You can override this method for a custom notification when your listeners may be listening to multiple use cases at a time.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to notify.

      • notifyFinishedUseCase

        protected abstract void notifyFinishedUseCase(T listener)

        You can override this method for a custom notification when your listeners may be listening to multiple use cases at a time.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to notify.
